text: Patricia Shakesby (born 6 November 1942) is an English actress and playwright. She is best known for her role as Polly Urquhart in the BBC One television drama Howards' Way and the original cast member as Susan Cunningham in ITV's Coronation Street from the first-on-screen interest Ken Barlow. She was born in Cottingham, East Riding of Yorkshire. == Other websites == * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Yorkshire Category:People from the East Riding of Yorkshire
title: Patricia Shakesby
